summary: Mi novio me ha dado los regalos de navidad atrasados, estoy tan feliz, deseaba mucho la waflera, me encanta el té y nunca he...
body:
Mi novio me ha dado los regalos de navidad atrasados, estoy tan feliz, deseaba mucho la waflera, me encanta el té y nunca he leído Orgullo y Prejuicio, lo cual me entusiasma mucho, en especial con una edición tan bella como lo es la de Barnes and Noble.

También me llama la atención el libro de ahsoka <3

summary: What You Sow
title: What You Sow
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2Tavrb6

by runrarebit

Snoke was the First Order’s Dominant Alpha, in killing him Kylo has both taken his place and destabilized the social structure, throwing the First Order’s omegas into heat and alphas into rut at a time when the fleet’s pheromone scrubbers have ceased working. Kylo, an alpha who does not like omegas, finds this deeply troublesome, all the more so when Hux goes into heat.

Words: 3972, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Star Wars - All Media Types
  • Rating: Explicit
  • Warnings: Graphic Depictions Of Violence
  • Categories: F/F, F/M, M/M
  • Characters: Ben Solo | Kylo Ren, Armitage Hux
  • Relationships: Armitage Hux/Kylo Ren, Kylo Ren/Rey (One Sided), Kylo Ren/Luke (A moment of one sided attraction deeply regretted)
  • Additional Tags: Non-Traditional Alpha/Beta/Omega Dynamics, Rape/Non-con Elements, Misogyny, Kylo Ren’s questionable sexual fantasies, Unreliable Narrator, a touch of incest, Violence, Murder, Tags May Change, Alpha/Beta/Omega Dynamics, Alpha Kylo Ren, Omega Armitage Hux, beta rey, Kylo Ren Has Issues, omegas are both fierce and bloodthirsty, instincts, However you’d term misogyny when it’s directed towards omegas but also misogyny misogyny, there will be smut


read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2Tavrb6

blog.name: spell-cleaver
blog.title: Canon has no dominion here.
blog.description: She/her. Teenager. Star Wars and some other fandoms and writing | I do take writing requests, provided they’re short oneshots or just plot summaries, so if you have something you want to see written just send me an ask!

summary: 1. Modern AU for the prompts if you're still accepting them? Luke and Vader? Pretty please?
question: 1. Modern AU for the prompts if you're still accepting them? Luke and Vader? Pretty please?
answer:
Of course I’m still accepting them! I’ll be accepting them as long as people keep sending prompts in :)

This is fluffier than I usually write, but I was stuck on modern AU ideas so this is what came out.

Prompts from this post.

The doorbell rang, jerking Anakin out of his focus and sending him running to the door.

He swung it open, just in time for a small blond child to barrel into him.

“Daddy!" 

"Thank you for dropping him off, Mr. Darklighter,” Anakin said, patting Luke head awkwardly while he clung to his leg. “My turn tomorrow?”

“Of course. I’ll see you then.”

“Bye, Biggs!” Luke piped up. “Bye, Biggs’s dad!”

The man chuckled—Anakin had never understood why Luke called him that when he knew full well what his name was, but it seemed a running joke by now. “See you tomorrow, Luke.”

He and Biggs left, gently shutting the door behind them.

Anakin glanced down at Luke when they were gone. He still hadn’t detached himself from his leg.

“Are you ever going to let go?” he asked, amused.

Luke’s fervent head shake implied no.

Anakin gave an exaggerated sigh. “Well, alright then.” He took a step forward, dragging Luke across the floor on his foot. The boy squealed and held on tighter.

“I’m going up the stairs now!” he warned, then lifted Luke into midair and gently knocked him against a stair.

“Ow!” Luke complained, though Anakin was pretty sure that hadn’t hurt. Either way, it worked: he scrambled off the leg as quickly as possible and scampered up the stairs himself.

Once they were up there, Anakin headed back to his computer. He just needed to finish typing that sentence, then he could submit the story and hope the magazine published it—

“What’re you doing?” Luke asked, poking his head above his desk.

Anakin smiled, and lifted him into his lap so he could see the computer screen. “Sending my story in.”

“Is it gonna be published?”

“Hopefully.”

Luke screwed up his nose at the screen, then jabbed a finger at one line in particular. He was only just starting to read, but he tried, “Da— Dar—”

“Darth Vader,” Anakin supplied, tickling his sides lightly. Luke screamed and laughed. “That’s my penname.”

“Why do you need a penname?”

Anakin’s smile froze. How did he explain that?

How did he explain that he didn’t want Padmé to find out how different his views had become? She’d fallen in love with a political writer she agreed with; she’d left for reasons he didn’t know. Finding out that his politics had changed so much as well might destroy any chance they would ever have for reconciliation.

“Because my name isn’t that nice,” he tried.

Luke’s gasp couldn’t be more horrified. “But it sounds like my name!”

“Yes, and you have a lovely name.”

“But you—”

“How was your day at school?” Anakin tried desperately to change the subject.

Luckily, despite being his mother’s child in a great many ways, Luke hadn’t developed her argumentative skills yet. He accepted the subject change with a burst of glee.

“Great! I made a new best friend!”

“I thought Biggs was your best friend?”

“Yeah, but now I have another one. Her name’s Leia!”

“Really?”

“Yep! She was playing with my favourite car, so we decided to share. And race!”

“What?” Anakin asked. He had to laugh. “How did you race?”

“Who could get their car to the finish fastest. But then she cheated and I pulled her hair and she hit me.”

Anakin’s face hardened. “What.”

“And then we both got in trouble but we’re still friends.”

Anakin leaned forward, computer screen forgotten. “Well, okay. But what did you say her name was again?”

“Leia Naberrie.” Luke voice was almost proud that he remembered it.

Everything stopped.

“What?”
answer_abstract:
Of course I’m still accepting them! I’ll be accepting them as long as people keep sending prompts in :)

This is fluffier than I usually write, but I was stuck on modern AU ideas so this is what came out.

Prompts from this post.

The doorbell rang, jerking Anakin out of his focus and sending him running to the door.

He swung it open, just in time for a small blond child to barrel into him.

“Daddy!"

blog.name: mandowords
blog.title: Miit'alor
blog.description: I am a descriptivist linguist for the Mando'a language. I show what it can do, not what it MUST do. This is a place for discussion about Mando'a, and Mandalorian society and culture. Feel free to use the head cannons from this blog (or reblogged from others) in your RP or writing. All words and descriptions are taken from the mandoa.org Mandalorian Dictionary. Want to support this blog? Buy me a Kofi? OR buy some Mando'a themed items? Visit our Discord? Blog icon by Rina

summary: Ori'buyce, kih'kovid.
title: Ori'buyce, kih'kovid.
body:
[OH-ree-BOO-shay, KEE-koh-VEED]

All helmet, no head. Common term of derision for someone with an overdeveloped sense of authority

summary: Headcanon for Boba Fett's girlfriend being a super clingy loli :3
question: Headcanon for Boba Fett's girlfriend being a super clingy loli :3
answer:
After reading on what the hell a “loli” is, I want no part in this, at all. Its almost like people don’t read my rules at all. 

Theres apparently something called a “true loli” and the description of that alone is enough to make me reject this. That coupled with a quote from something called “Pedobear” that was with it… No. Just no.

If anyone is interested in a “true loli” they need to stop in the middle of a busy road and get hit by a truck. if anyone says “but I am interested in the “Legal lolis” that LOOK younger than they are” please set yourself on fire because that’s just basically saying you’re okay with people dating a “true loli”. 

And honestly? I am not here for any of that.

~Asteria
